posts.post_content:
Easily in my top 5 favorite cards for the set.

I have an SGC 30 Pattee with the tougher Sweet Caporal factory 25 back. Really want a Sovereign back if anyone has one. Can throw in a few bucks in trade depending on condition. Willing to do an even swap if the card is in worse shape....like even a lot worse. 

I also have an ungraded Piedmont available too.

Would also entertain trading for one with a Factory 30 back depending on condition.
